Context:
Jack Hanna founded John Hanna & Sons Ltd. with his son Ian in 1978. The company grew to represent some of the great family-owned wineries of the world. Jack was a respected member of the wine trade, known for his love of life and good wine. He had a passion for young people and education. In recognition of Jack's dedication to his industry and young people, the John Hanna Advanced Wine and Beverage Business Management Post-Graduate Scholarship has been established.
